00096   public function addUserAction( $accessLevel, $action )
00097   {
00098     $_map = PS::o( $this->_userActionMap, $accessLevel, array() );
00099 
00100     if ( ! in_array( $action, $_map ) )
00101       array_push( $_map, $action );
00102 
00103     //  Make sure we don't lose our error handler...
00104     if ( self::ACCESS_TO_ANY == $accessLevel )
00105     {
00106       if ( ! in_array( 'error', $_map ) )
00107         array_push( $_map, 'error' );
00108     }
00109     
00110     return $this->setUserActionMap( $accessLevel, $_map );
00111   }
00112 
00117   public function addUserActions( $accessLevel, $actions = array() )
00118   {
00119     foreach ( $actions as $_action ) 
00120       $this->addUserAction( $accessLevel, $_action );
00121     
00122     return $this->getOwner();
00123   }
